name: ZeroHedge Desktop
description:
This style reduces clutter and generally unnecessary content, particularly on the individual article or post pages. As I'm middle aged the font size of the individual article pages is significantly increased.

This style also assumes you are running an ad blocking extension for your browser. If you aren't, your results will no doubt be different.
additional_info:
9/26/14 - tweaked layout a little bit, primarily by setting the main column to a fixed width of 650px.

1/29/15 - Applied a Google font to the headings and tweaked the link style.

10/15/16 - Updated for latest website design. The main menu is now visible at all times. Max width of articles is now limited to 940 pixels and the font size and line height has been increased.

12/30/17 - Updated for new source code of website. Made improvements, adjustments and changes throughout.
